description: Robert O'Leary, 42, sold a Skoda Octavia used to plant a bomb under a PSNI officer's car.
title: Shandon Park: Dublin man who supplied police bomb attack car jailed
title_page: Shandon Park: Dublin man who supplied police bomb attack car jailed - BBC News
maintext: In sentencing him on Friday, Mr Justice Tony Hunt said that even though the court was satisfied he was not a "higher up" IRA member, the car he supplied was "a pivotal element" in the attempt to murder a police officer in Northern Ireland.
